CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 24, 1952, page 2, reads: "'Hear No Evil' - Clara Stewart and Clifford Stewart, both of Youngstown, and Richard Mayfair of Webster Avenue look as though they're playing a popular game 'See no evil, hear no evil, speak no evil'; but actually they are trying to avoid the cameraman as they take an oath before Alderman Frank R. Bruno Monday afternoon. Along with a third man, the three pictured waived the hearing and were held for court on a charge of possession of narcotics under $20,000 bond each. All four were arrested in May of 1951 in a Hill hotel with 853 grains of heroin in their room. - Teenie Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Clara Stewart, Clifford Stewart, and Richard Mayfair cover their faces as they take oath in court on a charge of possession of narcotics
